title: sadogie
author: sadogie
content: Interested in if anyone has done any research into zk-asics or are excited about the potential for this. Seems like it may be a big deal in the future.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: sadogie on November 13, 2022, 03:52:16 PMInterested in if anyone has done any research into zk-asics or are excited about the potential for this. Seems like it may be a big deal in the future.Give more information about this mining. If this applies to Ethereum, then this is a POS algorithm. If this is a new coin, then the ASIC manufacturer and not the miners make the most money. Video cards give miners more choice of coins to mine.
